results.title: [Usefulness of atenolol in the treatment of patients with chronic bronchitis or bronchial asthma].
results.text_hl: [Usefulness of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in the treatment of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Bronchitis_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D029481 @@@chronic bronchitis@@@ or @DISEASE_Asthma @DISEASE_MESH:D001249 @@@bronchial asthma@@@].

results.title: The effect of beta-blockers on ventilatory function in chronic bronchitis.
results.text_hl: The effect of @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on @DISEASE_Embolism_Air @DISEASE_MESH:D004618 @@@air-flow obstruction@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Bronchitis_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D029481 @@@chronic bronchitis@@@ was evaluated by means of a double-blind, placebo-controlled cross-over trial.

citations.NLM: Ranchod A, Keeton GR, Benatar SR. The effect of beta-blockers on ventilatory function in chronic bronchitis. S Afr Med J. 1982 Mar 20;61(12):423-4. PMID: 7038918
citations.BibTeX: @article{7038918, title={The effect of beta-blockers on ventilatory function in chronic bronchitis.}, author={Ranchod A and Keeton GR and Benatar SR}, journal={S Afr Med J}, volume={61}, number={12}, pages={423-4}}

results.title: Long-term treatment of angina pectoris with bisoprolol or atenolol in patients with chronic obstructive bronchitis: a randomized, double-blind crossover study.
results.text_hl: Long-term treatment of @DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina pectoris@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Bisoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017298 @@@bisoprolol@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Bronchitis_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D029481 @@@chronic obstructive bronchitis@@@: a randomized, double-blind crossover study.

citations.NLM: Dorow P, Thalhofer S, Bethge H, Disselhoff G, Wagner G. Long-term treatment of angina pectoris with bisoprolol or atenolol in patients with chronic obstructive bronchitis: a randomized, double-blind crossover study. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1990;16 Suppl 5():S36-44. PMID: 11527135
